turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need to order pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, that is a specialty pizza they offer.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. I would like two of those small.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, please note that they charge for additional cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $28, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i will order you 2 small hawaiian pizzas with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, and I just I just want to pick that up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. No, that will be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
